title: The Reciprocal Narrowing of "Social Justice" Storytelling
description:
Kirstin Du Mez asked on Twitter "When did 'social justice' become demonized in the church community? Is there a smart article that documents it? 

That's a good question. Here are a variety of answers given to her. https://paulvanderklay.me/2021/03/26/kkdm-tweet-when-did-social-justice-get-demonized/

Working for the poor has always been a focus of the church. The Apostle Paul documents this in Galatians 2. 

Tom Holland, NT Wright, Unbelievable https://youtu.be/nlf_ULB26cU
Kyle Harper From Shame to Sin https://amzn.to/2PHcqR6
George Marsden Fundamentalism and American Culture https://amzn.to/39mZt5Y
Mark Noll the Civil War as theological crisis https://amzn.to/3fmsS3L
How the Civil War converted white theological protestants to secularism https://www.patheos.com/blogs/anxiousbench/2021/01/how-the-civil-rights-movement-converted-liberal-white-protestants-to-secularism/
Chuck Colson Born Again https://amzn.to/39kRINS
Soul Searching Christian Smith https://amzn.to/3dfrJbF
Atheism Plus https://rationalwiki.org/wiki/Atheism_Plus
James Lindsay https://youtu.be/sZ520OLvDZs
Kevin DeYoung What is the Mission of the Church https://amzn.to/3foxnem
Glenn Beck Social Justice https://sojo.net/articles/glenn-beck-responds-social-justice-perversion-gospel
Decaying Christianity causing folk religion https://youtu.be/blsI6xBoRFs
My Name is Earl White Lie Christmas https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0654819/
@The Critical Drinker Female Thor https://youtu.be/FYnVCzwH3Mc
@The Critical Drinker Done with Marvel https://youtu.be/zAt0LHKlTMY
@Jonathan Pageau Parasitic Story telling https://youtu.be/gFxu3Q71NvE
@John Vervaeke Awakening from the Meaning Crisis 13 https://youtu.be/vGB8k7jk1AQ
@The James Delingpole Channel Tom Holland https://youtu.be/R8J2aChrf7Q
Why Christian Movies are so terrible https://youtu.be/50_3J6Go5Ng

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/pX5qBdUH

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here.
